title: Where's the New Center of the Court?
itunes:title: Where's the New Center of the Court?
description:
Constitutional law professor Josh Blackman of the South Texas College of Law, discusses the Supreme Court's latest term and the influence of the new 6 to 3 conservative majority.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
